source:
%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
        THEN T1.ServiceDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END AS ServiceDataID, -- surrogate key
    T3.case_number as CaseReference,
    T3.salutation AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname AS FirstName,
    T3.lastname AS LastName,
    T3.address1 AS AddressLine1,
    T3.address2 AS AddressLine2,
    T3.city AS AddressTown,
    T3.county AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode AS Postcode,
    T3.country AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisationname AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtypename AS OrganisationType,
    T3.typeofinvolvement AS Role,
    T3.telephoneoffice AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.telephonemobile AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.fax AS FaxNumber,
    T3.email AS EmailAddress,

    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number = T1.ServiceDataID 
        AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) <> T1.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData,
    T1.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user T3 ON T3.case_number = T3.case_number and T1.IsActive = 'Y'



WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.case_number = T1.ServiceDataID 
            AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) <> T1.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        -- flags deleted data
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )
;

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW service_user_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select
    ServiceDataID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From service_user_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ServiceDataID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM service_user_dim_new WHERE ServiceDataID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim AS Target
USING service_user_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.ServiceDataID = Target.ServiceDataID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

%%sql
-- Insert new SXOID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ServiceDataID NULLS LAST) AS ServiceDataID,
    CaseReference,
    Salutation,
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressTown,
    AddressCounty,
    Postcode,
    AddressCountry,
    Organisation,
    OrganisationType,
    Role,
    TelephoneNumber,
    OtherPhoneNumber,
    FaxNumber,
    EmailAddress,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim;
